metadata.name: circuit lapse :: tread lightly in time child
metadata.description:
falling through time, like layers of cloud  
through a liquid prism

time travel occurs in the mind, tread lightly..

-  
Deconstructed memory painting. Created from footage from a mountain stream, using a mix of custom digital feedback and painterly/compositing video processes.

1920x1080 15sec

1/1

* Artwork originally minted minted on Nov 16, 2021 on the first Foundation contract. Moved to personal contract in 2023.
